member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Owin.OwinFeatureCollection.SupportsWebSockets
member.summary: Gets or sets if the underlying server supports WebSockets. This is enabled by default. The value should be consistent across requests.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Owin.OwinWebSocketAcceptAdapter
member.summary: This adapts the OWIN WebSocket accept flow to match the ASP.NET WebSocket Accept flow. This enables ASP.NET components to use WebSockets on OWIN based servers.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Owin.WebSocketAcceptAdapter
member.summary: This adapts the ASP.NET WebSocket Accept flow to match the OWIN WebSocket accept flow. This enables OWIN based components to use WebSockets on ASP.NET servers.
